item.description:
Dinner before the New Years Eve Dance
Fridayday, Dec. 31, 5 pm. to 7:30 pm
The Common Man Restaurant
88 Range Rd,
off of exit 3 of rt. 93
Windham, NH 03087
(603) 898-0088

Host: Steve Obermiler 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Join Steve O. and 20 + friends for dinner before the Dance at the Castleton. This is a great place to eat with fantastic food and drinks at a good prices. Steve O. will be there at 5 pm. for dinner. He hopes that we can be seated by 5:30. But, they will not seat us until we are all there. If you would like to join us just for drinks and mingling at anytime. Then at 7:30 pm. we will head over to the Castleton for an evening of dancing, witch is about 1/2 mile away . Please see the write up on the Castleton Event for more info. about the Dance and mingle. Please RSVP for this Event and get your ticket for the Dance ASAP.
Steve O. will need to have all of your RSVPs in by 4;00 pm. on Friday the 31 st. Yet, if you wish to just drop in, do so. We will find a seat when you get here.

Please contact Steve O. at ob@tds.net 603-491-1962
The Common Man Restaurant
Windham, NH. 603.898.0088

www.thecommonman.com

88 Range Rd, Windham, NH 03470
From I-93 take exit 3 ... Proceed down route 111 East and turn right at Range rd. (The Windham farm stand will be in front of you)... Were down Range Road (route 111A) approximately a 1/2 mile on the right.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner before New Years Dancing
